author: The Associated Press
title: United Technologies tops 3Q profit forecasts
text:
United Technologies tops 3Q profit forecasts The Associated Press HARTFORD, Conn. 
United Technologies Corp. (UTX) on Tuesday reported third-quarter profit of $1.36 billion. 
On a per-share basis, the Hartford, Connecticut-based company said it had profit of $1.54. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $1.67 per share. 
The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.54 per share. 
The maker of elevators, helicopters, jet engines and other products posted revenue of $13.79 billion in the period, falling short of Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $14.59 billion. 
United Technologies expects full-year earnings to be $6.15 to $6.30 per share, with revenue in the range of $57 billion to $58 billion. 
United Technologies shares have fallen 20 percent since the beginning of the year, while the Standard & Poor's 500 index has dropped 1 percent. The stock has declined slightly more than 9 percent in the last 12 months.
